version_description:
Bug fixes and performance improvements. I know what you're thinking... what were the bugs and what was improved?!

Well, in this update:

- Emojis are here! You can now scroll through the emojis. This will be improved over time to make it even
More performance enhancements. New features coming soon!
Chroma Keyboard is now Chroma Sync and features a shiny new app, allowing you to customise your keyboard.
This version fixes support for iOS 10.1+ giving you access to the keyboard once again if you've not yet updated to iOS 13.
